homedefaultJson.title: Bernard Sydney
homedefaultJson.description: My name is Bernard Sydney. I am a Web Developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.
homedefaultJson.subtitle: Creative Web & App Developer
homedefaultJson.description2: With 20 years experience as a professional Web developer, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success. I enjoy every step of the design process, from discussion and collaboration.
